record.name: Samoyed
record.description: Samoyed dog named after the Siberian nomad Samoyed, originated in the Russian Arctic, originated in the 17th century.

record.name: Alaska
record.description: "Alaskan sled dog is a kind of sled dog with wide head and triangular ears, which is what we often call erha. It is a kind of cute dog. The Alaskan sled dog, also known as the Alaskan dog, is one of the oldest polar sled dogs. Its name comes from the malamut tribe of the Inuit tribe of Eskimos. This tribe lives on the coast of Kotzebue in western Alaska. Adult Allah
